body:
Hey Guys,

I just want to share my appreciation of this great community.
Avicus is the first community on Minecraft that I felt at home with.
And here are the things I like to point out.
  • Friendly players.
  • Interactive forums.
  • Active community.
  • Organized community
Although sometimes there are some problems or glitches,
Avicus still has fun and exciting games.
And I believe that Avicus can grow and improve further in the coming years.

Thank you for this amazing communtiy :)
Cheers! :D

title: Appreciation

replies.body:
^ That maybe is some cruel, maybe truth.
m... this is like.... Maybe you should know some people?
We know Avicus is funny and people is good...
